name: nearest_distance_multi
title: Multi-Result Nearest Distance
description: This component calculates the nearest distance for multiple results

inputs.name: input_main_table
inputs.title: Input Main Table
inputs.description: The table to add the column to

inputs.name: geom_main_table
inputs.title: Geometry Main Table
inputs.description: The column containing geometries from main table

inputs.name: id_main_table
inputs.title: ID Main Table
inputs.description: The column containing ID from main table

inputs.name: input_second_table
inputs.title: Input table
inputs.description: The table to add the column to

inputs.name: geom_second_table
inputs.title: Geometry Second Table
inputs.description: The column containing geometries from second table

inputs.name: id_second_table
inputs.title: ID Second Table
inputs.description: The column containing ID from second table

inputs.name: radius
inputs.title: Radius constraint
inputs.description: Radius coverage to identify nearest feature (in meter)

outputs.name: output_table
outputs.title: Output table
outputs.description: The table with the column added
